mapper.insert: INSERT INTO finance_transaction(ref_type, ref_id, patient_id, admin_id, type, category, amount, description, status, created_at, updated_at, order_id) VALUES (#{refType}, #{refId}, #{patientId}, #{adminId}, #{type}, #{category}, #{amount}, #{description}, #{status}, now(), now(), #{orderId})
mapper.update: UPDATE finance_transaction SET amount = #{amount}, description = #{description}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE tx_id = #{txId}
mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS name, SUM(CASE WHEN type = 'INCOME' THEN amount ELSE 0 END) AS income, SUM(CASE WHEN type = 'EXPENSE' THEN amount ELSE 0 END) AS expense, COUNT(*) AS totalCount FROM finance_transaction WHERE created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d')
SELECT status AS name, COUNT(*) AS value FROM finance_transaction WHERE status IN ('COMPLETED', 'PENDING', 'REFUNDED') GROUP BY status ORDER BY FIELD(status, 'COMPLETED', 'PENDING', 'REFUNDED')

SELECT d.dept_name AS deptName, SUM(f.amount) income FROM finance_transaction f JOIN admin_account a ON a.admin_id = f.admin_id JOIN department d ON a.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE f.type = 'INCOME' GROUP BY d.dept_id ORDER BY income DESC

SELECT d.dept_name AS deptName, SUM( CASE WHEN f.type = 'INCOME' THEN f.amount ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN f.type = 'EXPENSE' THEN f.amount ELSE 0 END) AS netProfit FROM finance_transaction f JOIN admin_account a ON f.admin_id = a.admin_id JOIN department d ON a.dept_id = d.dept_id GROUP BY d.dept_id ORDER BY netProfit DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE finance_transaction SET status='COMPLETED' WHERE ref_type='PAYMENT' AND ref_id = (SELECT payment_id FROM payment WHERE order_id = #{orderId})

UPDATE finance_transaction SET status = 'COMPLETED' WHERE tx_id = ( SELECT tx_id FROM ( SELECT tx_id FROM finance_transaction WHERE patient_id = #{patientId} AND ref_type = 'RECORD' AND status = 'PENDING' AND type = 'INCOME' ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT 1 ) AS sub )
mapper.select: SELECT p.patient_id AS patientId, p.name AS patientName, SUM(f.amount) AS unpaidTotal, count(tx_id) AS countTx FROM finance_transaction f JOIN patient p ON p.patient_id = f.patient_id WHERE f.status = 'PENDING' AND f.type != 'CLAIM' GROUP BY p.patient_id HAVING unpaidTotal > 0 ORDER BY unpaidTotal DESC

SELECT p.patient_id AS patientId, p.name AS patientName, SUM(f.amount) AS unpaidTotal, count(tx_id) AS countTx FROM finance_transaction f JOIN patient p ON p.patient_id = f.patient_id WHERE f.patient_id = #{patientId} AND f.status = 'PENDING' AND f.type != 'CLAIM' GROUP BY p.patient_id HAVING unpaidTotal > 0 ORDER BY unpaidTotal DESC

SELECT f.tx_id AS txId, f.description AS description, f.amount AS amount, f.created_at AS createdAt, f.status AS status FROM finance_transaction f WHERE f.patient_id = #{patientId} AND f.status = 'PENDING' AND f.type != 'CLAIM' ORDER BY f.created_at DESC
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(amount), 0) FROM finance_transaction WHERE patient_id = #{patientId} AND status = 'PENDING' AND type != 'CLAIM'
